attributes.background:
Lower the petrol prices in the UK by 10p, in the last year petrol prices have went up 14p!
A petition needs to be held to make a change, if we don’t do or say anything now it’s only going to get worse

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting the price of fuel. 

You could start a new petition about something the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for. For example, you could start a new petition asking for all taxes on fuel to be removed or capped, if that’s something you’d like to happen. 

You'll need to give your full name in order to start a new petition.
